## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                        | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `code`    | `code`    | ISO-1302 country code to rotate to | `string` | `"fr"`      |
| `height`  | `height`  | Canvas height                      | `number` | `330`       |
| `options` | `options` | Globe options                      | `any`    | `undefined` |
| `width`   | `width`   | Canvas width                       | `number` | `330`       |
